thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Tad from Texas
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Tad from Texas

author: Tad from Texas
title: Tad from Texas
text: I used the online chat support. On the other end they were able to look up an old order, create an account for me and place the order with little or no effort on my part. Mabel's labels have helped us keep track of thousands of dollars worth of not only everyday clothes but equestrian riding equipment we might have otherwise lost. I'm a big fan of Mabel's labels!
